publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1753 Johann Lamont: Mortgage Rights (Scotland) Bill—That the Social Justice Committee considers the Mortgage Rights (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the order of the Bill, save that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-1753 Johann Lamont: Mortgage Rights (Scotland) Bill—That the Social Justice Committee considers the Mortgage Rights (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the order of the Bill, save that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.
